website_summaries.verdict: These stylish rain boots are perfect for everyday or if you're stepping out into some precipitation. Featuring a variety of matte and shiny colors, the Tinsley Rain Boot is the epitome of function and style.
pros: A padded footbed for extra comfort
Waterproof but chic enough to wear during work
cons: The shoe inserts tend to slide around inside

customer_reviews.title: Leave these and go with the Hunter boots!
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with these "wide" rainboots. I bought these and some Hunter boots to compare. I live in the Pacific Northwest where is rains 80% of Winter days. I have wide feet and normally love Sam Edelman shoes, but these were actually less wide then the "regular width" Hunter boots I bought. I also felt like these boots were too long and I was going to trip in them. The photos are comparing the two. I would recommend the Hunter boots over these just based on fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nutsch

customer_reviews.title: Painful, slightly narrow, no support.
customer_reviews.text: If I could return these, I would. Unfortunately it took several wears to figure that out. They rub my pinky toes, and are uncomfortable to wear for more than 10 minutes. I walk a lot, and these are just poorly made. I can feel the ground when I walk. They do seem water resistant. I haven't tested them in huge puddles or torrential rain. They are stylish, but they are not that flattering because of the awkward height of the boot. I really regret wasting $60 on these boots and now I have to purchase a different pair, mostly because they are painful and definitely not healthy for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of this boot and love that it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this boot and love that it's a discreet waterproof rainboot. Unfortunately, the matte black shows scuffs and ends up looking terrible after awhile. I re-purchase this at the beginning of the year to replace the pair I bought in the fall. But once boot season comes around again, I plan to look for a more durable pair. Also, because this is a synthetic waterproof boot, it does not breathe. Perfect on really rainy days but not great for everyday, all-day, repeated wear.
customer_reviews.author: gd320

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never before gotten compliments on rain boots
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure these were going to work because I have wide feet. At first, they were too tight with the insoles. I wore them for extended walks between my house and my bus stop without them. It started to hurt a little after the second walk. I decided to try it again with the insoles and - miracle of miracles - the boots had stretched just enough so that they now fit perfectly. I’ve worn them several times now since it’s been rainy around here lately. I walk a lot and they feel good. I’ve gotten random compliments from both women and men because they just look like stylish Chelsea boots.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: If you're like me that always have a snug fit with boots
customer_reviews.text: For narrow and slim feet. Order at least a whole size up. If you're like me that always have a snug fit with boots, this might be too small as I could barely get my feet in the opening, and the elastic is deceptive as its more decorative than functional. If you have wide feet, you're gonna be the Cinderella stepsister. Might have to fold your feet in. Very narrow opening up top. Overall, very pretty and good quality but bad sizing as it caters very specifically to slim/narrow feet. Would buy next lifetime if born with narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAlexa

customer_reviews.title: Expected Boot to Look Less Rubbery
customer_reviews.text: The style and design were appealing for a rain boot. However, when I received the boots, I realized I didn't like the texture as it seemed too rubbery. I know they are a synthetic material, and I was willing to overlook that, but the height in the front kept rubbing my shin. Although I ordered a half-size up (size 7), they were still too tight for my taste. I knew it was going to take some time to break them in, and I usually don't have to do that with any other footwear that I buy. I returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality. They are pasted with glue!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the shoes on September. Wear them less than 10 times and they ripped appart. Very poor quality. They are not sewn, the are literally pasted with glue. They do not worth the money you pay for. Now I cannot Return them. Very disappointed. Please, check the pics.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Sam Edelman Suede Booties are excellent but these are poorly designed. They are cut small and tight and have no "give" and cut into my wife's little toe rendering them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Zenster

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A FUNCTIONABLE RAIN BOOTS!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this boot couple months ago to prepare the rain this year. I wore it today to work and it wet my whole socks and the boots rub off my ankle which made ankle skin look red. If you are looking for a pair of rain boots, then don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few days to break into. The insides are rough an rub against the calf/ankles. Had redness and bruises the first time I wore them. But after a few days, no more of that. Pros: *Once you break-in, super comfortable. Can walk in them all day. *Water-proof, can also wear them in the snow. *Stylish and goes well with most clothes I wear. Cons: *Initially very painful. Runs a little small, but will fit once you start using it. *Kinda slippery, have slipped wearing them in the rain/snow. Wish it had better grip. *The elastic sides wear-off easily. Few uses and it already looks like I've had these for ages. *Insole is okay, not the best.
customer_reviews.author: AQ

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: i purchased these boots in March of 2018. i didn't really wear them too much initially, but have recently worn them a lot. when i first bought them, the rubber would rub against my calf so i had to wear them with pants tucked into them. i am writing a review now because i noticed recently that the elastic has been fraying. honestly, i'm quite disappointed. i would expect better quality from a brand like sam edelman.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, classic look, good fit
customer_reviews.text: Who knew I would be more excited to wear these than leather boots? But they look dressed up enough to wear out and about without anyone knowing they are rain boots. The fit in toes is great. I will wear taller socks with them since the back is a slight rub where there was no sock. Love that the back loop helps you get them on and off. I ordered them because I saw them on my favorite blogger's site extrapetite.com. She was right- they ARE great.
customer_reviews.author: bookinhand

customer_reviews.title: Okay product, it will do the job
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I bought these shoes because they were cheaper than others and I definitely got what I paid for. Not the best quality, and definitely lower quality than other brands like Hunter boots. You have to break in the shoes at the opening and wear long socks so they don’t rub up against your legs. I’m going to keep them though because I probably won’t find something better in my price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but an 8 fit me just fine in these
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8.5, but an 8 fit me just fine in these. My feet are a little wide but that wasn't a problem. Overall, very pleased! They are pretty much a rubber rain boot but they don't look like it. The elastic is very thick and sturdy. The heel is short, not quite an inch. VERY comfortable and durable. They don't breathe, unfortunately, but that's just part of the deal with rubber boots :) otherwise I love them.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: True to size for 7M
customer_reviews.text: They are very nice looking, just like in the photo posted by the seller. I ordered a size 7 in black and they fit me perfectly but... they killed my ankles... I have thin ankles, they will definitely not fit a women with mid to wide ankles. I took them on our long trip abroad and when I wore them I ended with terrible rashes on my ankles with skin almost raw even while wearing thick socks. They are ok to wear them if you only need to walk for a few blocks, but if you plan to walk for 20 minutes or more, I do not recommend, the pain was awful!
customer_reviews.author: mltm

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite boots! Professional looking
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite boots! Professional looking, so I can wear them with slacks at work; perfect for rainy PNW weather. You can tuck your pants into them on the way to work, and untuck your pantlegs when you get there. Insulated for absolute waterproofing and a little temperature management. One thing to note: the soles do slip around the first handful of times you wear them, so just remember to readjust them each time you put them on; once they learn the shape of your feet, they stay in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Emily S

customer_reviews.title: Little narrow. Fell apart first week.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: just got these and elastic stitching on the side completely unraveled. So now I have to deal with a return and reorder item. They don’t do exchanges better off going through Zappos. Really disappointed in the quality. Style very cute and well priced. Length good for me. My feet are medium to wide so the fit is a bit narrow but ok.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stirling

customer_reviews.title: Had to check and see if I mistakenly ordered narrow
customer_reviews.text: I felt excited about the design of this boot and the sizing options offered, however, I was disappointed in the actual width of this "wide" shoe. Poor fit. Too bad because they were super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome double-duty shoes- tourist approved.
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these boots. I had an 8-day European vacation planned and the weather was looking pretty bleak as I was packing. Obviously, space was at a premium and I thought: "I wish there was a waterproof shoe that could also double as a actual shoe." Voila! These do double duty perfectly, perfectly water proof but also chic enough to wear around inconspicuously on a nice day. So happy I took the plunge, I will definitely continue to get use out of these stateside.
customer_reviews.author: Emma DelVecchio

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: So many people complimented me when I wore this. It has a great silhouette and doesn't look like a rubber boot at all, which makes it really easy to wear with other clothes on a non-rainy day. However, when I wore it for the first time. I wore it without socks and it rubbed very hard against my legs. But that problem didn't come back once I wore it a few times. I guess it needs a little breaking in. But I love this shoe so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute boot but runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: I'm a solid size 9 shoe, normal width across the board with every shoe in my adult life. This boot it pretty narrow, and is only comfortable if I have socks thick enough to cushion but not too thick to make them feel too small (Bombas cotton crew socks work great in winter). Aesthetically, they work as easy rain boots for a work day that can pass as regular booties with the right pants. I like them, but just wish i had ordered a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Cute Rain Boots
customer_reviews.text: My foot size is usually 5.5 US and I don't have particularly narrow or wide feet, but I read that you should order up half a size so I got the size 6. They fit extremely well and the material is very waterproof (besides the stretchy material, but I knew that part wasn't going to be waterproof). They don't come up too far on me and I'm 5'3. I can wear them with normal thickness socks but also have room to wear thicker socks if needed. I love these shoes and they're perfect, cute rainboots for college!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are a great stylish rainboot
customer_reviews.text: These are a great stylish rainboot. We traveled in France and expected rain so I ordered these for our trip so I wouldn't have to wear bulky rain boots. They were very comfortable, as we walked A LOT. They might scratch easy, though. That would be the only fault in them. Other than that, they are easy to put on, lightweight, and look good in and out of your jeans.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter R.

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They are great for rainy weather and I walked several miles daily in them while on vacation and they were still comfortable! I recommend (as do other users) that you wear socks that are a bit taller so they don't rub in the back but I did and had no problems. These are a stylish way to keep your feet dry instead of traditional rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Fallbeck

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the rain boots a few weeks ago and after 12 times wearing the rain boots - they tore. I am super disappointed as I expected rain boots to last and be more durable - at least a year. after a month of wear - this product failed. I contacted Customer Support and they said that they can not refund or exchange - I need to complete a Defect Form and send in the boots at my expense. Thereafter, someone will review the boots to identify if indeed it's a defect. This is normal wear - after 12 times worn - badly done Sam Edelman. I'm going to buy Sperry or Hunter boots. Boo.....
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, I love the Sam Edelman brand. However, these did not look nor feel like a quality piece. My feet are a little wide, but I've never had to buy wide in any of my shoes - these were too tight even with the length being spot-on. I planned to wear these on a trip to London and they would have suffocated my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to see that they offered these in an 8W. They arrived super fast but felt much narrower when I tried them on. The material doesn’t allow air flow so prepare for sweaty feet. The aesthetic is very chic tho, so if you’re willing to suffer for fashion go for it, but order at least a size up!
customer_reviews.author: Ryann

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: Love these rainboots! Mind you I'm using these in the rain of Southern California. I haven't had any issues, in regards to withstanding puddles and SoCal rain storms. Also love how stylish and cute these are, I don't feel the need to change my boots when getting into the office as these don't look like I'm about to go puddle splashing! These are also comfortable, and don't feel rubbery inside
customer_reviews.author: Veith

customer_reviews.title: great boots
customer_reviews.text: I put these on for the first time in the morning to run errands, ended up being out for longer then planned and had almost no problems with them through out the day. Only tip I'd give is to wear longer socks, because one of the boots rubbed on my ankle on the inside of my left foot a bit too much and started a small blister. The second time I wore them with longer socks all day at work and they were great.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy uncomfortable inseam
customer_reviews.text: They look/feel like good quality boots other than one thing. The top seem that goes around your ankle is super rough and irritating. My socks I wore with these for a few hours didn't go above the boots and it was a mistake. Left blisters on my ankles, so incredibly uncomfortable. And the shoes I got were the right size. So I would say if you have tall socks you're probably fine but don't just slip these on to run out bc ouch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insole Issues
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shape and look of this boot but the in sole on the right shoe quickly started to move after 2-3 uses. I had a previous version I bought from the store and had the same issue (same side). A bit of a shame because I really like these but it’s uncomfortable to wear with the insole issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 9, I typically wear 8.5 or 9 or a euro size 39. They fit real snug and I have slightly wider feet so the fronts feel tight. I wore around the house with double socks and have been wearing them everyday and they’re fine and not hurting my feet but still tight. I think that they feel very sturdy and weatherproof
customer_reviews.author: Laura R.

customer_reviews.title: Wide Feet Review
customer_reviews.text: Cute boots. I do have wider feet, so the boots did fit like I expected, to be a tad tighter than usual; but they still work for me, just wouldn't walk in them for a long time or am not able to wear thicker socks with. I gave the shoes a 4 star because at times, the inside back edge of the boot would scrape on the back of my leg but sometimes doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: MaoX

customer_reviews.title: Classy but Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Living in an area where winter roads are treated with salt, leather boots need constant attention. I bought the Tinsley in hopes of having a low-maintenance pair of booties that would be professional enough for work, yet perfect for tromping through slush. I'm a very true 6.5M, but I sized up to a 7M . ( I have purchased Sam Edelman booties before, so I was pretty confident in my order. When the booties arrived the length of them was perfect. However, the width of the toe box was very narrow, to the point of being uncomfortable. Since they are rubber, I ended up returning them, because it seemed unlikely that they would stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Jackson

customer_reviews.title: What’s that smell?
customer_reviews.text: As cute as they are (and trust me they are adorable), when taking them out of the box i was immediately thrown off by the way they smell. OMG it’s awful!!!! It smells like pvc rubber mixed with an orange zest... i have aired them out, sprayed them with other smells and nothing gets this smell out. I can smell it every time I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It's protecting from the rain good so far
customer_reviews.text: I put some shoe inserts in them because the shoes absolutely no arch. It's protecting from the rain good so far. I'm a size 5 1/2 in everything but I sized up a half size to a 6 because I had a feeling I needed to put shoe inserts in them. I have very narrow feet but the tips of the shoes kind of squeeze them which is a first for me. Not the best to walk in but they are really stylish. Oh and you'll need to wear longer socks not no show socks because the ankle parts a bit stiff. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Option for Wet Weather
customer_reviews.text: These boots are my new favorite shoe to wear. Maine in winter can be pretty wet and dirty with puddles and sand/salt on all walkways. I didn't want to ruin my nice suede/leather boots this winter so chose to order these. I describe them as a hybrid shoe...look more like real boots but are waterproof "rain" boots. They are super comfy and I have been getting so many compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Cutest rain booties; make feet a bit sweaty.
customer_reviews.text: They look SO cute on... love the matte black. Got compliments the first day I wore them. The one drawback is they don’t breathe (bc they’re rain boots) so my feet sweat a little and don’t dry. FYI, I don’t have particularly sweaty feet. Honestly I forget, and wear them all day, bc they look and feel like normal shoes until I take them off.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These boots are great. Maybe a little cheaper then I expected them ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great. Maybe a little cheaper then I expected them to look. But overall for the price a great and classic looking pair of rain boots. They are slightly narrow, I wouldn't say I have wide feet but they also aren't very narrow either and these are just a tad tighter then expected. I wouldn't be able to wear them with thick sides for the width only. But a size 8 feet perfectly as expected. They aren't Hunter boots but they are perfect price and perfect for walking around in a city in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel C.

customer_reviews.title: The style is adorable, they fit well on my size 5 feet
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these every rainy day! The style is adorable, they fit well on my size 5 feet, and they do not coff my ankles. I would strongly recommend these shoes to others looking for ankle rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Need a wider width!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots but they weren’t available in a wide width when I ordered them. Unfortunately I had to return them. I went a size up and that didn’t help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Little Stiff at first......
customer_reviews.text: Shoes have very clean lines, which is why I purchased. I wanted something simple and comfortable. Where rated as comfortable to walk in, but I found them to be a little stiff at first, with not much support for walking. I purchased them to walk to work in on rainy days, but didn't think they would work. After a few weeks of walking in the rain, they softened up and are pretty comfortable, I will however purchase a insert for the heal-this will help to give a little more cushion in the heel. Glad I kept them....they were a great value !!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these booties with the intention of wearing them while on vacation, where lots of walking in uncertain weather conditions (rain, snow, mud) was inevitable. I ordered based on my shoe size with other Sam Edelman products. However, I think if I would have ordered a size up, the shoes would have still been uncomfortable. While there is fabric lining, there is little soft padding inside. The fit is narrow and tight in the toe, and tight around my heel--resulting in several blisters after a day of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Kate Felts

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these boots. The second time I wore them my dog got out of her electric fence and I spent about an hour trekking through the muddy woods before I was able to catch her. My feet stayed dry, comfortable, stylish and warm (it was about 35 degrees out) the whole time. The boots also still look brand new and are holding up exceptionally well. They may not stand the test of time but for the prIce I will happily buy them again. Only real con I’ve found is the boot will rub against my skin on the back of my leg if there isn’t something inbetween.
customer_reviews.author: Review#M

customer_reviews.title: These are great, looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: These are great, looks really nice, and doesn't skid. Only problem was there were no half sizes and boots are usually big on me, so I ordered a 7 thinking I will even have space as my sister with bigger feet is a 7 in boots. Found out they were wrote narrow and my pinky toe hurts like crazy after a long day of wear. Hoping to stretch it out. We'll see. Fits thin and chunky socks just fine but the top is narrow, so I'd recommend a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: but terribly uncomfortable when you wear them without socks or leggings
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and sleek, but terribly uncomfortable when you wear them without socks or leggings, which limits the use of the boots. I have blisters on the backs of my ankles from wearing these for less than 10 minutes. My Hunters are the most comfortable and will still be using those primarily. I would save your money and go with something else.
customer_reviews.author: K in SF

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These were not at all what I expected. When I received them in the mail you could see glue around the sole and they felt like terrible rain boots. No support, not comfortable. Really turned me away from this brand all together
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these - I'm in California and we're finally getting rain!!! They're easy to get on and off, and totally waterproof. I wear a 7.5 shoe, and ordered both a 7 and an 8 to see which fit best. I kept the 8 - it's very comfortable without feeling too big, and allow thick socks if needed. I was concerned that they'd chafe on the back of the calf/ankle, but at least when I wear them with socks, they don't.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in California

customer_reviews.title: I really like these boots
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. I agree with others that they are a bit on the narrow side, so if you have a wide foot, keep that in mind. The boots keep my feet dry and I didn't have any of the issues with leaks that some of the other purchasers pointed out. I like that these can be work with leggings, jeans or khakis and you'll still look somewhat put together without trying much. All in all, this is a stylish and cute weather boot.
customer_reviews.author: lala315

customer_reviews.title: Run Narrow!
customer_reviews.text: Love the style & look of rain boot. Just so narrow hurts my toe, had to get 11, I wear 10 but they killed me. Now the 11 slips up & down when I walk. Sure hope I can stretch them just a tiny bit on right foot. Doubt they'll stretch cause of material. And I have a narrow foot, feet... Pooh
customer_reviews.author: Gail Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Way too tight/narrow. I am a size 9 and never have problem finding boots/shoes that fit. Disappointed in these.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Soles are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The inside soles of these shoes are horrible! Completely wrecked after a couple wears. The inside soles also are not glued or connected to the bottom so they slide up when you walk in them. I’ve have them for almost a month and will likely just replace the soles with better ones. Other than that I love the boots because they are light rain boots which makes it easy to walk in and the style is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable!
customer_reviews.text: My Sam Edelman Boots are PERFECT. They were exactly what I was looking for: waterproof and cute. I also like how there are so many different color options. You do have to watch out for scuffing but that's pretty easy to get out. Overall, excellent purchase and true to size!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: So. Freaking. Narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Oof. These boots are cute as hell, but SO NARROW. I can only wear them for about an hour before they become seriously uncomfortable. And I don't have particularly wide feet. Like, I don't own any wide shoes, these just happen to be made for ladies with dainty feet, which -- I have learned -- is not me.
customer_reviews.author: cmacks

customer_reviews.title: Quite narrow
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really enjoy these shoes! They look great and the function amazingly (no wet feet for me). Unfortunately, the shoe fits quite narrowly so they begin to hurt my pinky toes after wearing them for some time. I wear a size 9 and wouldn't say that I have a wide foot. As such, I can't wear any thick socks and generally go for my thinner ones. My roommate has a this exact same shoe in a smaller size and does not experience this problem. I don't know if they just didn't get wider as the size got bigger? If they were wider they'd be the perfect shoe for the price point!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Barrio

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They're so cute and very easy to style with and they seem to be good quality so far, but they're too uncomfortable to wear all day. My heels are killing me like I've been wearing high heel shoes or something. I've tried heel inserts but it doesn't help enough so I'll try another insert in order to make them more wearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I almost always wear an 8.5. Based on other reviews, I ordered up and got a size 9. I'm glad I did. They fit well and can be worn with decently thick socks. They seem like they're okay quality. I will be returning them because they're just not for me. Jeans look awkward tucked in and you can't wear your pants over them because of the awkward tab at the back. I really like them, but they're just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Saylor

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have only have these for 8 months with minimal use (under 10 times) The GLUE (yes, it’s glue) holding the fabric together with the rubber has come completely unattached. Had them too long to return, and didn’t wear them enough to notice the poor quality until it was too late. Don’t purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Park

customer_reviews.title: Sooo Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Have yet to wear out the house, but they feel great when trying on, and they are super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, but not durable
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these boots about every other day for 2 weeks now. There is lot of snow, rain and ice where I live and the tread does a decent job of not letting me slip. They fit pretty well, but the sole inserts have fallen apart, the outer matte paint has started to scuff pretty badly, and the tread is already getting worn out. These pictures are taken after I cleaned them off with soap and water; I'm not sure if polishing would help with the scuffing in this case. Overall, these boots are comfortable to wear but I wish they were a bit more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this versatile bootie. I was initially skeptical of rain booties since they can make your legs appear shorter (I'm 5'1"), but not the case with these babies. They have a slimming fit, while being super comfy. Walked all day in the rainy streets of Paris with no complaints! Best part is that they're super easy to clean. At such a great price, I'm considering buying another pair just in case!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots, but tight across the top
customer_reviews.text: The boots fit me fine, except I bought them for my daughter who couldn’t wear them because they were too tight across the top of her foot.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Ayala

customer_reviews.title: What? They’re comfortable rain boots? YES
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these. They are so comfortable to wear to and from work. Only thing is that it sounds a bit clunky when I’m in the office so I usually change into a separate pair of shoes inside
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice rainboot that doesn't scream rainboot
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for an upcoming vacation. I am hopeful that they will be comfortable for sightseeing in rainy and cool weather. As others have stated this is a rainboot that doesn't scream rainboot. I have worn them a few times in a comfort test and I have not had any problems. I am giving them 3 stars because I am not yet sure what the comfort level will be for extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: jenbob

customer_reviews.title: Great rain boot- cute and stylish
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint and the reason for 4 stars is the boots left little specs of black on my tile floors the first time I wore them. Not a deal breaks but a bit odd.
customer_reviews.author: Keely B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, but Be Careful of the Stitching
customer_reviews.text: They are very cute, they fit really well, but I wore them for less than 20 mins and the stitching on the side (where the rubber meets the elastic) tore already. Definitely planning to return for a new pair. Crossing my fingers it was just a bad pair or something.
customer_reviews.author: jchapman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty boots but too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear to work when its raining but I still want to look nice. I love the look of them! They have a gold embellishment on the back side underneath the loop. Its not tacky or cheap looking at all though. I am returning them for a size up. I usually wear a size 9 so that's what I ordered, however they were tight on my ankle bones and pretty small in the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: ordered twice, both times, left boot was smaller than the right one.  Had to return both orders.
customer_reviews.text: ordered twice, both times, left boot was smaller than the right one. Had to return both orders.
customer_reviews.author: Monique B.

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is functional as a rain boot and fairly light so it's not too bad for commuting. It is definitely lower quality than the other Sam Edelman shoes that I have. The rubber is very stiff so it can be uncomfortable to wear these for long periods and the interior liner is not glued down so it slips and bunches while you walk, which can be very uncomfortable. The shoe is not expensive but you're also not really getting a great deal either.
customer_reviews.author: RKoll

customer_reviews.title: These boots look great and are very versatile for New England weather
customer_reviews.text: These boots look great and are very versatile for New England weather. I ordered wide width, because that was all that was available in my size (I do not order wide normally), and they were still very tight and did make the outside of my feet sore so I would imagine the standard width is very narrow. Otherwise, very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KC87

customer_reviews.title: but that were not comfortable at all to wear to work
customer_reviews.text: These boots are made for walking! I walk to work everyday and I have gone through 2 other rain booties that look similar to this, but that were not comfortable at all to wear to work. I am a 7.5 usually and the 7 was too small. The 8 is a little loose, but fits perfectly with thicker socks. Finally a pair of booties that does not give me blisters!
customer_reviews.author: phoebe

customer_reviews.title: Slippery but looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid boot but scratches easily and slippery on snow. Really only good for light rain conditions.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional
customer_reviews.text: I really like these rain booties and they are just what I was looking for. I hate the stiff feeling of traditional tall rubber rain boots, and these booties are super cute while also keeping my feet dry. They're my new go-to boots for rainy weather! I'm not giving them 5 stars, however, because I wish that they came in half sizes. I'm a 7.5, so I sized up to the 8 and they fit a little bit big. Otherwise, I would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: petitchatonTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Break after two uses!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes came unglued after two wears! Terrible. They fit at expected and I love that they are matte black. But I wish they didn’t break!!
customer_reviews.author: R P X

customer_reviews.title: Width runs small
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this boot. I have skinny legs and ankles and this was extremely uncomfortable. It rubbed my ankle with or without socks I was not able to wear it. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Oms

customer_reviews.title: Not good for wide feet and uncomfortable soles.
customer_reviews.text: While these boots are cute, they're not very practical. They're very narrow and quite uncomfortable. The bottoms are not slipped resistant either. The only plus is that they're waterproof. Wouldn't repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ajane

customer_reviews.title: The best.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! I ended up needing a size up because they were snug with normal socks and I planned on being able to wear thicker socks as well for rainy winter days. They’re not super breathable, which is to be expected with rain boots, but they hold up well against giant puddles standing between me and my classes. I get compliments on them every time I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bate

customer_reviews.title: ORDER A SIZE UP!
customer_reviews.text: The boots came exactly as pictured. They definitely run a bit narrow and very small. I'm usually a size 9 but ordered a size 10 after reading some of the reviews. I was able to wear the size 10 comfortably all day while wearing a pair of thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Verzbickis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots. Very cute and get tons of compliments
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boots. Very cute and get tons of compliments. My only complaint is if you wear low socks with them, the stitching from the back seam rubs your ankle raw. Talked to a friend who ordered the same pair after she saw mine and she said the same thing happened to her as well. So, wear above ankle socks and you'll be great
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Wear tall sox but otherwise ok
customer_reviews.text: Fashionable, but DEFINITELY wear TALL socks with these bad boys--the cuff will rub the skin raw very very quickly! The inside sole in the right bootie came out within a couple wears, which is annoying, plus it seems that while they're waterproof, they aren't pebble-proof? Hoping there's not a hole already, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jarcy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Fits true to size and the best rain boot
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots. I purchased last minute for a trip to Paris where it has been raining heavily. I wore them for the first time all weekend and seriously loved the boots. Had typical first time wearing discomfort (I should have worn them first before walking all over Paris in them). However, they are great quality and really lightweight for a rain boot. They aren't chunky or squeak like typical rain boots and for the most part kept my feet warm. I wish I had found this earlier in my life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: These are great! While I mainly use for rainy day commutes, they look and feel very high quality and I've worn them out as well. I have narrow feet and these are perfect. They do rub a bit at the opening, so I do have to wear tall socks with them, which looks a little silly if I'm commuting in a skirt or dress, but with pants or tights they look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Janne

customer_reviews.title: Style without substance
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, but unfortunately, they are not waterproof. I've worn them in the rain and ended up with wet socks. The inside soles are not glued down properly and slide around a lot, which is frustrating (and when I tried to just take them out, the boots were too uncomfortable to wear). Finally, the elastic part on the side of one of my boots ripped after just a few wears. I didn't wear them for anything heavy-duty, and I have narrow ankles, so not sure why this happened other than poor construction. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look so stylish. Never guessed these are rain shoes
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Wore them to my trip to London/ Ireland and loved it. It didn't rain at all while I was there (hahahah) but I wore these just in case and u would have never guessed they are rain shoes
customer_reviews.author: Day

customer_reviews.title: great for price
customer_reviews.text: The fitting of the foot part is great. I need to wear long sox because it rubs above my ankle, but that's OK
customer_reviews.author: basha

customer_reviews.title: buy half size smaller if you're in between
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 and 7 cuz normally I wear 6.5. 7 was way too big so 6 fit perfectly. I would say to go half size down if you're in between. I bought this is matte black and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Gracie

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in the green and black because I was unsure of which color I wanted. I ended up returning the black. I like the shoe, cute look for a rainy day but not that comfortable to walk in. Also, I wouldn't trust the boots in heavy rain or water so I think for an outing where it's raining but you still want to look stylish these are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, dont buy, insoles fell out after 2 days.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure if your a half size get a size 8. Shoe insoles ripped off after 2 days. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: For those who want rain boots that don't look like rain boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect matte color, comfortable fit, and really cute look! These are worth the extra dollars over their cheaper look-alikes, and they pass for any other cute chelsea boot out there. Sam Edelman is a quality and reliable brand, and my other SE shoes have held up for quite a while. Looking forward to wearing these in the rain!
customer_reviews.author: Maya P.

customer_reviews.title: No Traction
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of these are felt. I walked around on my wood floor and slipped a ton, so I can't imagine walking if the ground was actually wet. Definitely going to be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Webb

customer_reviews.title: Very smelly
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrendous. I think it's the plastic but it was unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: D'Anna Watson

customer_reviews.title: Sore feet!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are very cute, but they are very uncomfortable. I bought the shoes for a trip to Seattle and I figured I needed waterproof shoes it did help with the rain but they were very uncomfortable to walk in and I would get blisters in my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Poulos

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the good reviews (mostly), I thought I'd try these boots. What a disappointment! The top of the boots rubbed against my ankles with the first step I took. I knew it would be a losing battle so had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Sojourner

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These are very narrow, I don’t have wide feet and never need to buy wide shoes, but these really pinch my pinky toes to the point of developing sores. I would return if I could
customer_reviews.author: Mushka

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, style, runs slightly small, round up half size
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price! Matte finish is great and allows these shoes to be more versatile. I've worn Sam Edelman heels before, and that pair had poor arch support, but with these boots, I had zero foot pain after a long day of work. Stylish and fit well. I wear a 9-9.5 and ordered a 10.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Rain Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these rain boots because they're cute and stylish, and they don't actually look like rain boots. I bought these boots in black matte, and the waterproof rubber almost looks like leather, which I love! However, it was really hard to take them off, and the rubber rubbed against the back of my ankle. I guess I'll just have to always wear them with thick tights or socks to prevent blisters, but I don't really mind that.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: If the quality is anything like my Sam Edelman flats
customer_reviews.text: Bought these when we had an unexpected rainstorm in CA, they are comfy and look professional. If the quality is anything like my Sam Edelman flats, I’ll have these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Krisy1989

customer_reviews.title: Must have for all women!!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfectly stylish and functional. Great for girls on the go and won’t let a little rain stop them. Versatile in case the rain comes only for part of the day, and you don’t want to wear tall, hot rain boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look Good Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the wide with because of other reviews. They still feel a bit snug. Not super comfortable on me. Look good though.
customer_reviews.author: Thearne

customer_reviews.title: Scuffs
customer_reviews.text: I got these boots a week ago. I had another pair from another brand that I used for years and decided to get new ones because they had gotten scuffed up from so much use. Unfortunately, after only a few wears there are already scuffs on my new boots. Other than that the product is what it appears like in the photo, I just wish I hadn’t paid so much to get cheap boots.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

product_meta.title: Sam Edelman Women's Tinsley Rain Boot
product_meta.description:
Chelsea rain boot with deep elastic goring on sides .To measure your foot length, sit down on a chair and place foot flat on a piece of paper. Trace the foot by holding a pencil vertically and outlining the foot. The longest toe and back of heel are the most important measurements. Using a ruler, measure the distance from the bottom of the heel to the tip of the longest toe. Record the result in both inches and centimeters and use these measurements to find your size in the chart. If one foot is larger than the other, the measurements for the larger foot should be used.

Sam Edelman shoes epitomize chic comfort. With exceptional materials and fine styling, each pair of Sam Edelman shoes is an affordable luxury that cleverly combines a youthful outlook with a worldly sensibility. Sophistication with down-to-earth appeal mean that these shoes are made to be lived in. Whether it's a classic revisited for a modern interpretation or a cutting edge design, Sam Edelman shoes always keep an emphasis on comfort.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately ankle-high from arch
Inset elastic gores at shaft, Pull tab at top line
